locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Had a good experience coming here. Shower was clean & I gave the lady who cleaned them a high 5. Plenty of parking & they have a on site barbershop outside the place.

Would def visit again if im in the area.

Bama Trucker - ROLL TIDE

‚Ä¶ , Kentucky,BEWARE!!!! Typical TA lot's of pay-per-noview(RP) parking spot, Popeye's, Pizza Hut,and restaurant for food.Shower room badly needed to remodel,to narrow u need to go out to change ur üò£üòÖmind,no counter nothing to put ur ‚Ä¶

it's a convenient place to stop and relax
you can wash your TV, take a shower eat use the restroom

This trash whole is such a disrespect to truck drivers. $16.00 for a shower and they are the nastiest looking showers I have ever seen. Some kind of slimy brown filth at the bottom of the walls. I stood on a towel the entire time in the ‚Ä¶

Worst TA ever!!! Dirty, empty shelves, Def not working,showers are gross!! Employees are top notch and professional!! I‚Äôve seen better bodegas in the Bronx!! This is a ownership/management problem, he drops ZERO profits back into the ‚Ä¶

Showers are gross..was sitting in the lounge and watched the lady clean one and the only thing they did was wipe up the water on the floor and clean the sink area. Did not clean the shower or the toilet. ‚Ä¶

Good food. Great shower, with only one addendum, there really needs to be shower curtains and drains outside of the showers. I was in #6, shower pressure was awesome by the way, and the shower head selections were fabulous-greatly ‚Ä¶
Coming from someone who lives in a truck, one of the only things we can enjoy outside of the vehicle is a shower, and clean bathrooms. ‚Ä¶

The showers are tiny . Only the handicapped shower is large enough. Two people's literally cannot fit into any others. The tile was cracking and falling off revealing rust and mold . Got a refund after looking at the closet showers upstairs ‚Ä¶

Was pleasantly surprised at this TA. From the time walked in the door. We met Peach at the desk and she was awesome and very helpful, to getting a nice shower and then a great breakfast with smiling faces and great service. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ of respect for the amount of money we spend at this establishment. In the images you can clearly see a piece of excrement on the bathroom floor. As well the freshly cleaned shower had hair in the drain. Totally unsanitary and unacceptable.
‚Ä¶ üöø The shower was large and clean with lots of hot water and decent water pressure. They just need to replace the shower heads. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The shower that I used today was a disappointment.  Clearly, it was in need of maintenance. There was what appeared to be, back mold, hard water stains, and rusted fixtures. The water was soft and felt like I was dirtier coming out of the ‚Ä¶

Went to take a shower someone hair everywhere . Not clean at all what a waste of a shower. I just couldn‚Äôt do it. Come on people just nasty. Whoever in charge of cleaning, it shows how you keep your house just  nasty. SMH  I will put you on ‚Ä¶

The shower was absolutely disgusting. You can tell they do not clean it. There is black mold everywhere! The toilet has scum in it. The trash can was disgusting, the fan did not work. There was no fire alarm. There are scratches all over- ‚Ä¶

This place has become a dump.  Couldn't get a shower because no one was cleaning them.  Trucks parked everywhere,  making this place a hazard for emergency equipment.  It's just too bad that this is a typical representative of all the truck ‚Ä¶

DO NOT, I REPEAT, DO NOT book a shower here. If there are 10 people in line then you are looking at a 2 hour wait normally. If there are 20, then you are lookin at well over 3 hours even though there are 15 showers total. Staff refuses to ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ in the driver lounge, or maybe there were just grunge looking truck drivers, but the latter is just benefit of the doubt. The bathrooms weren't too bad.  My shower was a little moldy. It's about time they remodel them, by the looks of it. ‚Ä¶

3 hours for a shower. Didn‚Äôt even clean it just tossed towels in. All the hot food expired and after asking if they were going to have any was told no. Hands down worst experience at a flying j/pilot but hey ample parking wherever you want!

I mainly come here cause of the parking, but this time I took a shower. I have a process I go thru, so I got ready to get in the shower üöø and found a used bath cloth. Oh I was pissed! But I was already undress to shower and didn't feel like ‚Ä¶

Stop here for the night the sign in the parking lot says they charge $10 for overnight parking but the guy charged me $12 got a shower could use a little bit of updating for those showers otherwise not a bad place

‚Ä¶ . Telling me they had to sign something saying they would stop. But sold me a Black n Mild with a card. Strange. But anyway. Diesel fuel was less then anywhere around also have showers. Make Sure you don't forget to wear your shower shoes.

showerReviews.reviewText: This is the worst loves when it comes to showers. The showers are extremely small, I had a corner shower that had no bench in it to sit down on. So I asked the guy was there any showers that had a bench in it because I need one to sit down ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ you have your own cleaning supplies‚Ä¶..All I can say is NASTYY. Started out at the pilot and it had 14 guest in line for a shower. So we looked up loves and notice all of their showers were available. So we decided to drive over there. ‚Ä¶

Year later I'm back still same. Did full exp. Shower, fuel, laundry and food.  Shower ok,  laundry area filthy. Food area look dirty floors havent been mopped or sweep in years. Tiny store, no parking, no easy access to pumps. Dirty store. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ this is my second bad experience stopping at this loves. On February 5,2025 my partner and I booked a shower on the app like we always do and got shower #4 with the code to go in. After entering they came and knock on the door and we ‚Ä¶
Second time I use this location and both time it wasn‚Äôt clean there was hair and finger nails on the floor a dirty towel was left in the shower it does not reflect loves quality I‚Äôm use to

Can't give 0 stars!  No hot water in any shower but they were still selling showers! Shower was not cleaned, hair clippings in sink, wade of hair in shower, floor still had standing water across most of it. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . The reviews are all saying  same thing about this location employees. Tonight the store manager refused to let a service animal into the store while driver takes a shower. Told the driver to go get the paperwork that shows the dog was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ flat out lied. Wish I could give them no stars, this is the first Loves I have been to in the country That I do not want to go back. Going to take a shower. If it is as bad as the rest of the store I will be calling the district manager.

Stopped to take a shower. Soon as I walked into the shower room, I immediately noticed it hadn't been cleaned. The dead giveaway was the balled up wet wash cloth sitting on top of a new towel. I informed the manager and she informed me that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ !! Other than that Love's should be ashamed!! Broken women's bathroom. Then opening up shower rooms for the public bathroom use. And all they did before sending me in after was throw some towels in! Dirty shower curtains! We frequent ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ 6pm to 8pm. Hopefully at 7pm in this Pilot you won't find any parking or maybe 1 or 2 spots. As most Pilots it come with a good a good pack of showers and an area to go clean your close. Best time to get a quick shower is around 7pm to 8pm.

I only use pilots for parking and the occasional free shower (but I do not purchase fuel from PFJ, ever) That said, the parking lot at this Colonial Heights location is spacious and easy to get into without incident, even for a Swift driver ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Then I got a shower, no wait again.. shower was average asked for extra towels, it was no problem. ‚Ä¶

Come get some good pilot house coffee. You can eat wendys here take a shower they have 9 shower rooms staff is very friendly and at pilot we take care of all trnck drivers all driving needs. Theres even Roadside assistance and there mobile.

Disappointed to say the least. Finally finish the day to get a hot shower & hit the hay before going at it the following days. Only the "HOT" was missing, the towels were also missing, & it looked as if the last individual left the shower & ‚Ä¶

Don't come again here if you come you 100% waste time,  I am waiting before 2 hours for shower and still waiting Employees are rude and lazy no one clear shower.  I don't know why they people lazy maybe they worked for free
Very friendly and nice stuff, clean shower and  restroom. Wendy's restaurant available

‚Ä¶ spots to be had @ 4:00 pm. Manager was checking trucks in reserved spots but wasn't very enthused whrn we asked him to make someone move.  Got a shower fairly quickly.  Not much water pressure.  In AM, dude behind the counter did not want ‚Ä¶
Best shower I've had in a while. Employees are really good and helpful
This was my first time getting a shower here. It was worth every dollar. Hot, lots of force from the shower head, clean and secure. I felt very safe. It was glorious! Thank you

showerReviews.reviewText:
‚úÖüá∫üá∏‚ù§Ô∏èAlways impressed with the quality and vibe at Love‚Äôs Travel Stops!
Super clean, well-organized, and fully stocked with everything a traveler might need  from snacks to souvenirs. The staff is friendly and the variety is just ‚Ä¶

Love‚Äôs Truck Stop is a great place to stop. The store and bathrooms are very clean. Everything is well taken care of. There are lots of food options, from snacks to hot meals. It‚Äôs a good stop for gas, rest, and a quick bite to eat.

I'm not a trucker, but I'm on the road a lot for worl. If you are on a road trip, this is the perfect place to stop in to get your laundry done,  eat and use the bathroom.  They have Sahale snacks which are gluten free, dairy free and soy free.

Busy, Busy Place!  We have stopped a few times at this location.  Like that, they have a few options for food.  Godfathers pizza! Subway and DQ, then station food in Loves.  6 pumps, so 12 spots for gas.  Usually bathrooms are clean.  Friendly staff.  Good selection of drinks and snacks for the road.

If you‚Äôre looking for some place quick and clean to stop this is not it. The line to get gas was very full, but moved relatively fast for the amount of patrons. The bathrooms were filthy, the smell of urine all over the floor, overflowing ‚Ä¶

Our company mandates we fuel at loves. I try to avoid this one if i can , but unfortunately that usually isnt possible.  If the diesel islands aren't backed up or broken you can bet the bathrooms are. The fountain drinks, tea, and coffee taste weird. They definitely need to do some water quality tests.

Giving 2 stars because the people are nice. The rest of the place is a whole nother story.  The bathrooms and showers are nasty with hair everywhere and mold, too. Hotdogs were burnt and old. Do better

showerReviews.reviewText: Truck stop has plenty of parking and I cant complain about the showers being 8 bucks. However as I was using the toilet in the shower, someone unlocked the door and opened it as I was doing ‚Äúbusiness‚Äù. My partner claimed this happened as ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ as it's the only option in the area, free parking is definitely a plus. However, the service is poor and they refused to clean a shower room before providing it to me. And the food looks days old. Good thing they got a McDonald's next to it

‚Ä¶ fuel staff was great food case looks good so I bought a meal food was good. Came back in to take a shower Sunday morning it was an entirely different program lady at the counter treated me with utter contempt showers were a disaster as ‚Ä¶

The restroom was full, the lady cleanin the showers told me i could use one of the shower toilets.. very nice lady.. the person doing the store cash register was kinda snooty.. cost yall a 5 star review.. but, i survived.. i dont like ‚Ä¶
Plenty of parking , showers are decent , shower 2 is better than shower 1 as far as heat . It‚Äôs kinda a mom and pops truck stop but it works . You don‚Äôt have to pay for parking which is great

Employees do not knock before unlocking, and opening shower room doors. Employee opened every door to find the ‚Äúclean‚Äù shower, for me. Towels were replaced, but there was used toilet paper on the floor. Very dirty. While in the shower, ‚Ä¶
Very DURTY SHOWER, NO SOUP, NO TOWEL(I had to go buy towel) the lady still charged me full price for shower!
It was ok. Food isn't the freshest and no towels for a shower.

showerReviews.reviewText: This TA is perfectly located for my weekly route, so I‚Äôm here 2‚Äì3 times a week for fuel and showers. Shower rooms are large and clean, though my wife says the water doesn‚Äôt get hot enough for her‚Äîcold showers don‚Äôt bother me. Fuel island ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ it clean, Lots of parking. Good snack drink food selections, Little Ceasars was good. Only problem was my shower went from really hot to freezing cold Im less then a minute. Please fix the showers and ill come back! I was in green shower. üíö ‚Ä¶
Trucker here. I paid $14 for a shower and $2 for a coffee at a Petro fuel station near of Lexington, VA. When I came here, I expected something close to that price for a shower and coffee. ‚Ä¶
This place is great. Huge parking lot and the shower was roomy and clean. Staff was extra nice.
Best place for a shower in the trucking industry on the east coast. Good food at the dinner behind them too
You can't get a team shower.you have to pay for 2 shower's $10 each
